what is a prompt?

answers.text: A prompt is a short piece of text that is given to the large language model as input, and it can be used to control the output of the model in many ways.
A prompt is a short piece of text that is given to the small language model as input, and it can be used to control the output of the model in many ways.
A prompt is a short piece of code that is given to the large language model as input, and it can be used to control the output of the model in many ways.
A prompt is a short piece of text that is given to the large language model as input, and it can be used to control the input of the model in many ways.
